question.title: What will be the closing value of the S&P 500 on March 13, 2026?
question.description:
The [S\&P 500](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S%26P_500) is a stock market index that tracks the stock prices of 500 companies that are publicly traded in the United States. Its performance is widely followed and often used as a proxy for the overall performance of the U.S. stock market.

From 2023 through 2025, the S\&P 500 [saw significant gains](https://www.reuters.com/business/ai-spending-strong-corporate-profits-fed-rate-cuts-seen-key-2026-stock-market-2025-12-24/) as AI-related stocks surged in value. In 2024 alone, the index reached for the first time both [the 5000- and the 6000-point marks](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Closing_milestones_of_the_S%26P_500#Milestone_highs), and although it [dipped in the first two months of the new administration](https://www.gia.com/march-2025-market-recap/), the index has continued to rise in 2025, closing at an all-time high (as of this writing) of 6,932.05 on December 24, 2025.

[Prognosticators](https://www.thestreet.com/investing/stocks/every-major-wall-street-analysts-sp-500-forecast-for-2026) expect the S\&P 500 to continue to grow in 2026, albeit not at the rates seen in any of the previous three years, with "waning enthusiasm for A.I. and a drop in tech valuations" seen as the [top threat](https://www.nytimes.com/2025/12/23/business/dealbook/ai-rally-bubble-2026.html) to the market's continued growth.

`{"format":"metac_reveal_and_close_in_period","info":{"post_id":41347,"question_id":41051}}`
question.resolution_criteria: This question will resolve as the closing value of the S\&P 500 on March 13, 2026.
question.fine_print:
The question will resolve according to the close value reported by [Yahoo Finance](https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/%5ESPX/) unless Yahoo Finance fails to report a value or there is substantial reason to doubt the reported value, in which case another credible source may be used.

This question's resolution criteria (fine print, background info, etc) is synced with an [original identical question](https://www.metaculus.com/questions/41347) which opened on 2026-01-12 16:00:00. This question will resolve based on the stated resolution criteria and fine print. However, if this question would resolve differently than the original question, then this question will be annulled. Additionally, if the original question's resolution could have been known before this question opened, then this question will be annulled.
question.short_title: What will be the closing value of the S&P 500 on March 13, 2026?
